edu.iu.dsc.tws.rsched.utils

Class TarGzipPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.dsc.tws.rsched.utils.TarGzipPacker

  • public final class TarGzipPacker
extends java.lang.Object
    a class to generate a tar.gz file. Used to pack multiple files into an archive file

      • addTarGzipToArchive

        public boolean addTarGzipToArchive(java.lang.String tarGzipFile)
        given tar.gz file will be copied to this tar.gz file. all files will be transferred to new tar.gz file one by one. original directory structure will be kept intact
        Parameters:
        tarGzipFile - the archive file to be copied to the new archive

      • addZipToArchive

        public boolean addZipToArchive(java.lang.String zipFile)
        given tar.gz file will be copied to this tar.gz file. all files will be transferred to new tar.gz file one by one. original directory structure will be kept intact
        Parameters:
        zipFile - the archive file to be copied to the new archive

      • addZipToArchive

        public boolean addZipToArchive(java.lang.String zipFile,
                               java.lang.String dirPrefixForTar)
        given tar.gz file will be copied to this tar.gz file. all files will be transferred to new tar.gz file one by one. original directory structure will be kept intact
        Parameters:
        zipFile - the archive file to be copied to the new archive
        dirPrefixForTar - sub path inside the archive

      • addDirectoryToArchive

        public boolean addDirectoryToArchive(java.lang.String path)
        add all files in the given directory to the tar.gz file add the given prefix to all files in tar names do not copy files recursively. Only one level copying.
        Parameters:
        path - of the firectory to be added
